subject: Re: [R] trouble with help
body:
You should select it in the list of components to install, when the installerasks.It happens after you 3rd time press "Next" in the installation wizardwindow.Choose "Custom installation" and select all you need.

Schmitt, Corinna wrote:> > How can I install the html help?> > Corinna> > -----Ursprüngliche Nachricht-----> Von: r-help-bounces@stat.math.ethz.ch> [mailto:r-help-bounces@stat.math.ethz.ch] Im Auftrag von Vladimir Eremeev> Gesendet: Dienstag, 8. Mai 2007 12:22> An: r-help@stat.math.ethz.ch> Betreff: Re: [R] trouble with help> > Did you try manually opening the file mentioned in the browser> (Z:\Software\R\R-2.5.0\doc\html\index.html) ?> Does this file exist? > Was the html help installed?> > 
-- View this message in context: http://www.nabble.com/trouble-with-help-tf3708685.html#a10374007Sent from the R help mailing list archive at Nabble.com.
